page.description: Takes a property, like a dot variable, and converts it to JSON.

argument.name: prop
argument.description: An object that contains the properties to convert to JSON.

page.discussion: The property_to_json() function shares similarities with the json_generate() function. However, it uses a different mechanism and doesn't do nearly as much as json_generate.
page.example:
dim prop as p prop.name_first = "John" prop.name_last = "Smith" prop.occupation = "Cobbler"
? property_to_json(prop) = {"name":"John","name_first":"John","name_last":"Smith","occupation":"Cobbler"}
